channel.title: Need help hacking into my dads user
channel.description: I need help on hacking into my dads user. :| So i can download the latest java. Does anyone have any suggestions?

item.title: Need help hacking into my dads user
item.dc:creator: @kmb Kmb
item.description:
@kmb wrote:

davidude36:

seduce your dad… then you get him drunk and ask him his password, if that doesnt work then tie him up and tell him you will let him go if he gives you the password.

Social engineering is always the easiest way to get what you want. I wouldn’t suggest to tie him anywhere, though

Read full topic

item.title: Need help hacking into my dads user
item.dc:creator: @RXVL RXVL
item.description:
@RXVL wrote:

Rofl noobs. Reboot in safe mode and use the admin account in there to create a new admin account. Then reboot, go into the new one, make your other account an admin and log off. Then go into your old account and delete the new admin and install Java. Done!

Read full topic
item.source: Need help hacking into my dads user

item.title: Need help hacking into my dads user
item.dc:creator: @fellixombc fellixombc
item.description:
@fellixombc wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:3, topic:102496”][quote author=BobDole81 link=topic=146877.msg1397526#msg1397526 date=1180500870]
You need to hack a computer to download java? May I inquire as to why you would possibly need to do that?
[/quote]
You need Admin to install Java. He wants to hack into his Dad’s admin account.[/quote]

i did this on a school computer…save the files to my documents or to a document…my school let some programs though :).
though it should wrk cause it blocks it out of the hard drive and this is only for pros

item.title: Need help hacking into my dads user
item.dc:creator: @gho5t gho5t
item.description:
@gho5t wrote:

Uhh i dont know if this works if youre not on an admin account but try this.
Go onto your name and go to start>run.
a little box should pop up, type CMD.
A black box will pop up, type net user
Then type net user (dads account name) *
Ex: if your dads name was bob you would type:

net user bob *

Type a new password for the account, confirm it, and the pass should be changed. I just dont know if it works without admin.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @Javacisnotrecognized _^_
item.description:
@Javacisnotrecognized wrote:

Cheating and hacking are entirely different things.

As for your problem, just tell your dad that you have some important files on his account that you need to access for , then install it while he isn’t looking.
